subject: Specsy unit testing framework now runs on JUnit 5
msgSnippet: Hi, I ve recently released a JUnit 5 test engine for the Specsy unit testing framework (http://specsy.org/). This should be of interest to the JUnit 5 team and

Subject: Specsy unit testing framework now runs on JUnit 5
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=395435659; y=TpO0OkC0RoQ426S6eVl-amu6p9kmBLenRpkDEtxd9phjQLhgK98

--001a1143fe02a84dbc053432b46e
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8

Hi,

I've recently released a JUnit 5 test engine for the Specsy unit testing
framework (http://specsy.org/).

This should be of interest to the JUnit 5 team and IDE integration
developers, because Specsy produces quite different events from JUnit;
there are nested tests and the enclosing tests are typically executed
multiple times. Run the sample test on Specsy's front page for an example.

-- 
Esko Luontola
www.orfjackal.net

--001a1143fe02a84dbc053432b46e
